commit.message:
gfortranspec.c (library): New global, moved from ...

	* gfortranspec.c (library): New global, moved from ...
	(lang_specific_driver): ... here.
	(lang_specific_pre_link): Test it here before including
	libgfortran.spec.

From-SVN: r167027
